sections.heading: tax; not deducted from loan proceeds
sections.text: In the case of a pledge or mortgage of wheat as security for a loan under the federal price support program, no excise tax shall be deducted from the proceeds of such loan at the time the loan is made.SourceLaws 1955, c. 5, ยง 12, p. 63;Laws 2022, LB805, ยง 5.

2-2312.Excise tax; not deducted from loan proceeds.

In the case of a pledge or mortgage of wheat as security for a loan under the federal price support program, no excise tax shall be deducted from the proceeds of such loan at the time the loan is made.

SourceLaws 1955, c. 5, ยง 12, p. 63;Laws 2022, LB805, ยง 5.
